entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
